pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service

Interface PdfService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PdfServiceImpl

    public interface PdfService
    Interface for creating and managing PDF files.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File generateConfirmationForBorrowedBook(List<Book> bookList, User tempUser, Date expectedEndDate, String employeeName)
      Generates and returns the confirmation after borrowing the books.
      File generateConfirmationForNewAccount(User theUser)
      Generates and returns the confirmation after creating a new account.
      File generateConfirmationForReturnBook(User tempUser, String employeeName, List<Book> bookList)
      Generates and returns the confirmation after returning the books.
      File getBookLabel(Book tempBook, String userName)
      Generates and returns the label of the book with given parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getBookLabel

        File getBookLabel(Book tempBook,
                  String userName)
           throws com.itextpdf.text.BadElementException,
                  MalformedURLException,
                  IOException
        Generates and returns the label of the book with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        tempBook - The Book containing the book to generate a label
        userName - The String containing the name of the user who generated the label
        Returns:
        A File representing the PDF File with label
        Throws:
        IOException - A IOException is thrown when the file can't be created
        MalformedURLException - A MalformedURLException is thrown when URL is incorrect
        com.itextpdf.text.BadElementException - A BadElementException is thrown when created element has incorrect form.

      • generateConfirmationForNewAccount

        File generateConfirmationForNewAccount(User theUser)
        Generates and returns the confirmation after creating a new account.
        Parameters:
        theUser - The User containing the user
        Returns:
        A File representing the PDF File with confirmation

      • generateConfirmationForBorrowedBook

        File generateConfirmationForBorrowedBook(List<Book> bookList,
                                         User tempUser,
                                         Date expectedEndDate,
                                         String employeeName)
        Generates and returns the confirmation after borrowing the books.
        Parameters:
        bookList - The List<Book> containing the list of the borrowed books
        tempUser - The User containing the user who borrowed the books
        expectedEndDate - The Date containing the expected end date
        employeeName - The String containing the name of the employee
        Returns:
        A File representing the PDF File with confirmation

      • generateConfirmationForReturnBook

        File generateConfirmationForReturnBook(User tempUser,
                                       String employeeName,
                                       List<Book> bookList)
        Generates and returns the confirmation after returning the books.
        Parameters:
        tempUser - The User containing the user who returned the books
        employeeName - The String containing the name of the employee
        bookList - The List<Book> containing the list of the returned books
        Returns:
        A File representing the PDF File with confirmation
